review:
I know Dr Piyush since last 3 years and since I met him for the first time after delivery of my third child, now all my kids are treated by him only. This is the level of trust and satisfaction I got from Dr Piyush. He has expertise in child health and he is one of the doctor who doesn‚Äôt prescribe too much medicine for kids. He believes in treating with ease and not with aggression. 
I would love to share this and also he is highly recommended dr in city. 
Super heroes are real and he is one of them. 
God bless him always üôèüôè

review:
* ****** **** **** ********* *** ***** ** ********** **** *** *** ******** **** ***** ** ******* ** *** ********* He doesn't understand that parents are conserned when it comes to their babies. ****** *** * ****** **** ** *** **** *** ***** **** ** ** ****** *** **** ** *** ********* I ignored his arrogance for 2 years but finally it crossed my patience level and decided to switch to a better option.

If you guys have questions regarding your kid then definitely be ready for some arrogance coming from his side.. 

As a parent of a 1st child I would prefer some one who clears my doubt and advice me to be clam and not to worry. This doctor does the reverse, he will not bother to clam you down instead will shout at you *** **** **** ******* ** **** ****** 

This change in doctors behaviour I have seen in past 4-6 months. ****** *** * ********* ** **** ** ********** **** *** *** ******** ***** Other wise he is a nice doctor.

The vaccine given to my 6-8 month was taken out before the medicine was injected. My baby got measles. My bad I didn't voice it up then but yes I want other parents to be careful and voice out

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Extremely positive doctor. I would definitely recommend a visit. Once you meet him, you are bound to make all visits only to him. He knows children, infants,toddlers very well and doesn't create an issue when there is none. He encourages our good practices.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Children's Health,Pediatric Vaccinations,Paediatric care,Child nutrition Guidance,Child specialists ,
review: I have known Dr Shah for the last 3 years for my 2 daughters. I would not recommend any other. Dr Shah is fantastic with the diagnosis, prognosis and treatment. In most cases, he would not recommend a medicine unless absolutely needed. He is always available and he is a great counsel. Absolutely love him. When we moved to Mumbai from Chicago, it was a task to find a doctor who we were used to back then; someone who could treat with minimal drug intervention. Luckily we found Dr Shah.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Upfrontly Explained me the issue faced by my baby n what needs to b done. Best experience so far. Would definitely recommend him to my friends.
